title: Wolf Heart
description: Abby Reynolds is camping alone at Allegany State Park in her family's cabin.  She needed a little R&R, but what was supposed to be a normal, relaxing vacation becomes something entirely different when she finds a wolf in the shower building. But was it a wolf?  Because when Abby looks again, there is a woman crouching on the concrete floor, a naked woman who Abby can't take her eyes off of.  Abby is immediately attracted to this perfect stranger, but something strange is happening in the park that night.  Something that Abby can't explain.   When Shannon, the gorgeous stranger, and Abby come together, there is an intense, passionate attraction that makes Abby breathless.  But there is more to Shannon than meets the eye, and the strong, captivating woman just might have the heart of a wolf...
author: Bridget Essex
